metadata.title: CVE-2017-2668 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: 389-ds-base before versions 1.3.5.17 and 1.3.6.10 is vulnerable to aninvalid pointer dereference in the way LDAP bind requests are handled. Aremote unauthenticated attacker could use this flaw to make ns-slapd crashvia a specially crafted LDAP bind request, resulting in denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
